pr_title: Define bar width if bar chart contains only data for a single date

timeline.message: Define bar width if bar chart contains only data for a single date
Update tests regarding effektive timerange type change

timeline.bodyText: As far as I know the effective time range is always an AbsoluteTimeRange. Or is there a case were it can be another type?
timeline.author: linuspahl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ export type VisualizationComponentProps = {
   config: AggregationWidgetConfig,
   data: { [string]: Rows, events?: Events },
   editing?: boolean,
-  effectiveTimerange: TimeRange,
+  effectiveTimerange: AbsoluteTimeRange,

timeline.bodyText: I will create a follow up PR to replace all related hard coded values.
timeline.author: linuspahl
